text: Abantu babeyisizwe esisodwa ngakho-ke uMvelinqangi wathumela abaphrofethi njengabalethi bezindaba ezimnandi nabaxwayisi, wehlisela phansi kubona incwadi ngeqiniso ukuze yahlulele phakathi kwabantu kulokho ababehlukene (ababephikisene) ngako, futhi akekho owayehlukile kukona ngaphandle kwalabo ababenikwe (imibhalo) emva kokuba sebefikelwe ubufakazi obucacile ngenxa yenzondo nomona phakathi kwabo. UMvelinqangi wabaholela (eqinisweni) labo abakholwayo mayelana nalokho ababehlukene ngakho ngentando yakhe. Futhi uMvelinqangi uholela lowo amthandayo endleleni eqondile
